original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetusampayutto
analyzed: ▁an idassanaappaṭigh aṃ ▁hetu sampayutta ṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na an idassanaappaṭigh o ▁nahetu sam pa yutto

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: ▁nasanidassanas a ppaṭi gh o ▁nahetu sam pa yutto ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁pe ▁an idassanaappaṭigh aṃ

original: hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetusampayutto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: ▁hetu sampayutta ṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nasanidassanas a ppaṭi gh o ▁nahetu sam pa yutto ▁ca ▁na a nidassan a sappaṭigh o

original: nahetusampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe
Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁an idassanaappaṭigh aṃ ▁hetu vippayutt aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nasanidassanas a ppaṭi gh o ▁nahetu vippayutt o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ ▁hetuyā ▁tīṇi ▁pe ▁avigate ▁tīṇi
